s2.ptxt: Check the throttle control motor operating sound.

s3.ptxt: When pressing the accelerator pedal, check the operating sound of the running motor. Make sure that no friction noises emit from the motor.
If friction noise is heard, replace the throttle body.
Connect the intelligent tester to the DLC3.
Under Current Data, check that the throttle valve opening percentage (Throttle Pos) is within the standard.

atten3.ptxt: When checking the standard throttle valve opening percentage, the shift lever should be in the N position.

s3.ptxt: If the percentage is less than 60%, replace the throttle body.
